1.title: Chameleon

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Lila is back in class and seems to get everything she wants from her classmates, but Marinette believes she is lying and does not trust her, and she has the attention of her love Adrien.

2.title: Weredad

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: When Cat Noir almost understood that Marinette is Ladybug, Marinette panics and makes him believe she's in love with him to distract him. But her parents hear her and Tom, absolutely thrilled, invites Cat Noir to have breakfast with them. However, when the superhero tells them that he is not in love with Marinette, Tom, heartbroken, gets akumatized by Hawk Moth. Now as Weredad, a monstrous guard dog-man, he locks up Marinette in a prison of brambles to protect her from the outside world and heartbreak. Separated from Tikki, Marinette can't transform! Will Cat Noir be ...

4.title: Backwarder

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Ladybug and Cat Noir confront a friend of Master Fu. Transformed into Backwarder, she wants to catch up on wasted time by stealing others for a letter that she thinks it comes from Master Fu.

5.title: Stormy Weather 2

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Thanks to the comments of Chloé Bourgeois to Aurore Beauréal at the Collège Françoise Dupont, Ladybug and Cat Noir once again face Stormy Weather.

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

1.title: Stormy Weather

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Marinette is babysitting a child named Manon when her best friend Alya visits her. Alya tells Marinette that Adrien having a photo shoot nearby at the park and takes them to see him. Meanwhile, Aurore Borell has just lost to her competitor, Mireille Jattée, to become the next weather forecaster. Infuriated, she becomes influenced by Hawk Moth and turns into 'Stormy Weather', a villain who controls the weather.

2.title: The Bubbler

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: It is Adrien's birthday and Marinette is struggling to give him the present she made for him. When Adrien's father won't allow Adrien to have a birthday party, his best friend Nino becomes angry about how unfair he's being towards Adrien. Claiming that all parents want to stop kids from having fun, Nino becomes influenced by Hawk Moth's power and turns into 'Bubbler', a villain who sends all the parents into outer space through his bubbles.

3.title: Copycat

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: After she attempts to ask Adrien out to the movies over the phone, Marinette accidentally leaves behind an embarrassing voice mail and rushes out to delete it before he listens to it. Meanwhile, an artist named Theo is releasing a statue in honor of Ladybug and Cat Noir. He happens to be in love with Ladybug and is excited to see her at the unveiling event, but only Cat Noir ends up coming. After the event, Cat Noir insinuates to Theo that he and Ladybug are in 'that' kind of relationship, leaving Theo envious. Sensing his envy towards Cat Noir, Hawk Moth influences ...

4.title: Timebreaker

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Alix one of marianette's friends get akumatised under the name of Timebreaker with the ability to go back in time.

5.title: Mr. Pigeon

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Mr Ramier, a pigeons lover, is influenced by the Hawk Moth. On the other side, Marinette creates an original hat for a fashion competition at school.

6.title: Lady Wifi

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Alya, Marinette's best friend, is influenced by the Hawk Moth and becomes Lady Wifi. She is convinced that Chloé is Ladybug and wants to show it to the world. Ladybug has to protect her identity as well as to save Alya.

7.title: The Pharaoh

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: A young archaeologist, Jalil, becomes the Pharaoh fallowing an argument with the director of the museum. He wants to sacrifice Alya to bring back to life his princess died centuries ago.

8.title: Rogercop

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Police officer and Sabrina's father Roger is made a fool of at parent's show and tell day by Chloe's father Mayor Bourgeois. Disgusted by their actions he is influenced by Hawk Moth and transforms into Rogercop, a villain with the power to apprehend all in his path.

9.title: The Evillustrator

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Nathanael is humiliated by Chloe after his drawings are scattered all over the classroom, revealing his secret crush for Marinette. Determined to get revenge, Nathanael is influenced by Hawk Moth and transforms into the Evillustrator, a villain with the power to make anything he draws come to life.

10.title: Dark Cupid

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: It's Valentine's Day in Paris. Marinate is willing to tell Adrien she loves him, Adrien wants to admit is feelings to Ladybug and Kim is ready to make a big love declaration to Chloé. But nothing is going the way it was planned.

11.title: Horrificator

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: Mylène is the main actress in the short movie the class is doing. But the Hawk Moth influences her and she becomes a huge and ugly monster. Ladybug and Cat Noir has to defeat her.

12.title: Darkblade

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: It's Mayor election day in Paris. Mr Bourgeois wins it again, leaving his adversary Armand d'Argencourt totally humiliated by the results. This feeling attracts the Hawk Moth who influences the poor man. Now he is the villain Darkblade and he wants to take control of Paris as his family did in the past.

13.title: The Mime

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Mylène's father is hired to play under the Eiffel Tower a mime show. But a few hours before the show, he is fired. The Hawk Moth influences him and he can now make his mimes real.

14.title: Kung Food

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: Marinette's uncle Cheng Shifu, a famous Chinese chef, is in Paris to participate to a competition in Chloé's father's hotel. Marinate has some troubles to communicate with her uncle but Adrien, who speaks Chinese, comes to help her. During the competition, when Cheng Shifu prepares his dish, Chloé messes up with it and the Chinese chef looses the competition. Really angry and mad at Chloé, he becomes Kung Food under the influence of the Hawk Moth.

15.title: Gamer

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: Marinette, to be closer to Adrien, wins a video game competition at school and teams up with him for a national competition. But Max trained himself for months for this selection and is really upset. Influenced by the Hawk Moth, he becomes the Gamer.

16.title: Animan

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: A new panther arrives at Paris zoo. The director is really proud of her and gets mad when Kim says the panther is not as fast as him. The Hawk Moth takes advantage and influences the director of the zoo, who becomes Animan.

17.title: Antibug

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: As they just captured the akuma of Sabrina, who had become invisible, Ladybug and Cat Noir have to fight Chloé, who turned into Antibug after an argument with the real Ladybug. Ladybug will have to confront an opponent with the same powers as hers... will she pull through this time?

18.title: The Puppeteer

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: Marinette makes some puppets of Lady Wifi, Rogercop, the Evillustrator and of course Cat Noir and Ladybug. At the end of a baby-sitting with he little Manon, she gives her the Lady Wifi puppet against the will of Manon's mother. Then she finds out, the mother takes away the puppet and Manon starts to be very angry. The Hawk Moth feels it and influences her. She becomes the Puppeteer and can control Marinette's puppets. Will Cat Noir and Ladybug be able to stop her before she takes control of them?

19.title: Reflekta

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: Victim of the "class picture day curse', Juleka is once again not on the photo (Chloé had her locked in the restroom to take her spot next to Adrien on the picture!). Marinette wants to help Juleka but no one wants to take the picture again. Marinette decides to get rid of the picture so that the photographer has to take it again.

20.title: Guitar Villain

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: Marinette is entrusted with the design of the cover for Jagged Stone's new album. But she doesn't dare follow her intuition and Jagged rejects her design. Marinette decides to do it again, but this time, her way. But in the meantime, Jagged has been akumatized!

21.title: Pixelator

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: Vincent Asa, a huge fan of Jagged Stone becomes influenced by the Hawk Moth and wants to capture his idol's image forever. Cat Noir and Ladybug have to be careful to not be captured too.

22.title: Princess Fragrance

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: Prince Ali visits Paris and Rose, who loves him a lot, wants to meet him. But Chloé humiliates her and Hawk Moth influences her. She becomes Princess Fragrance.

23.title: Simon Says

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

23.plot: Marinette is punished by her father because she missed classes at school. She has to stay home and cannot be with Adrien at the TV show Nino appears on. But when Ladybug has to move into action, she will have to find a way to leave the house without her father knowing about it.

24.title: Volpina

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

24.plot: When Lila, the new girl at school, lies to everyone that she and Ladybug are close friends, Marinette becomes jealous since she was flirting with Adrien. While spying on Adrien and Lila in the library Tikki, her kwami, is desperate to get her hands on Adrien's book. But when Lila steals the book, she lies to Adrien at the park that she's the descendant of a super heroine. When Marinette's jealousy takes over, she humiliates Lila as Ladybug in front of Adrien. Jealous and upset, Lila is influenced by Hawk Moth and turns into Volpina, a villain who has the power of ...

25.title: Ladybug & Cat Noir (Origins - Part 1)

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

25.plot: Adrien wants to go to school like everyone but his father forbids him to do so. Becoming Cat Noir will give him the opportunity to have a taste of freedom and to put some fun into his life. As for Marinette, Chloés' scapegoat, she becomes friends with a new student, Alya, that she admires. Becoming Ladybug will give Marinette the opportunity to learn that her clumsiness is not inevitable.

26.title: Stone Heart (Origins - Part 2)

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

26.plot: After failing her first mission, Marinette refuses to become Ladybug ever again, yet Cat Noir can't handle everything on his own, so Marinette has no choice

0.title: Pire Noel

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

0.plot: It's Christmas in Paris, a time for generosity, giving and spending time with family. At least not for everyone, Adrien has to celebrate his first Christmas without his mom, and he thinks that his father is not interested in celebrating the holiday with him this year, which inspires him the idea to run away from home as Cat Noir to sing out his anger in the cold and snow. When the news of his disappearance spreads all over Paris, Adrien's friends go out searching for him while Marinette transforms as Ladybug to search the cold and snow for the boy she secretly loves. ...

1.title: The Collector

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: After Marinette learns more about the Miraculous book she took from Adrien, she begins to suspect his father of being Hawkmoth. Meanwhile, Gabriel, furious over Adrien losing the book, gets akumatized into The Collector.

2.title: Despair Bear

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: After Chloe's latest prank puts her friendship with Adrien at risk, she throws a party at the hotel for the entire class in an attempted display of niceness. However, she snaps after seeing Adrien dancing with Marinette and lashes out at her butler, getting him akumatized into Despair Bear.

3.title: Prime Queen

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Nadja Chamack, news reporter, invites Ladybug and Cat Noir for an interview. Nadja, noticing the playful conversation between the 2 superheros, questions if they are a couple. Ladybug denies they are together and Cat gives little remarks that make it seem like they are. Not wanting to answer personal questions that could reveal her identity, Ladybug leaves the interview before it is over. Nadja's ratings drop and her boss tells her she can no longer have her prime time show. Hawkmoth sends an akuma and turns her into Prime Queen, a villain who can reach through ...

4.title: The Befena

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: Marinette's grandma visits and gets akumatized into the Befena.

5.title: Riposte

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: A mysterious masked fencer is humiliated in a duel against Adrien. Boiling with rage, it breaks and it is akumatized in Riposte, and its saber seeks revenge.

6.title: Robostus

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Markov, a small robot invented by Max is akumatized in Robostus, a villain that can give life to unanimated objects.

7.title: Gigantitan

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: The Butterfly is trap at its own game when the Miraculous he sends does not reach the desired target. Ladybug and Cat noir will have to face a giant baby.

8.title: Dark Owl

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Mr. Damocles becomes the perfect target for Hawk Moth when his dreams of becoming a third superhero of Paris are crushed.

9.title: Glaciator

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Legendary ice cream maker Andre gets akumatized into Glaciator.

10.title: Sapotis

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Alya's little sisters, Ella and Etta, become Sapotis after staying up. Ladybug and Cat Noir must seek help from an ally to defeat the multiplying monsters.

11.title: Gorizilla

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: After failing to find Adrien, his bodyguard gets akumatized into Gorizilla. With his new sense of smell, he is able to track Adrien throughout Paris.

12.title: Captain Hardrock

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: After being akumatized by Hawk Moth into Captain Hardrock, Juleka's mother steers a powerful ship and blasts her music for all of Paris to hear.

13.title: Zombizou

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Miss Bustier is akumatized into Zombizou and turns Paris into kissing zombies.

14.title: Syren

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: A talented swimmer named Ondine with feelings for Kim is akumatized into Syren and turns Paris into an underwater kingdom for her prince.

15.title: Frightningale

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: A young singer and dancer hold auditions for a video honoring Ladybug and Cat Noir. Chloe stops the tryouts. Anguished, the singer is akumatized into Frightningale, who uses a magic mike to try and turn Paris into a living musical.

16.title: Troublemaker

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: After solving everyone else's problems way too much, Penny loses her cool and is infected with an akuma that transforms her into Troublemaker, a supervillain who causes problems instead.

17.title: Reverser

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: After Nathaniel disregards Marc's writing, Marc is akumatized into Reverser and determined to get revenge on Nathaniel and Marinette.

18.title: Anansi

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: Alya's overprotective, MMA fighting sister, Nora, is akumatized as Anansi, a spider-like villain. When Cat Noir is ensnared in her web, Ladybug gives the turtle miraculous to Nino. He becomes Carapace. They free Cat Noir and defeat Anansi.

19.title: Sandboy

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: While having to go without Tikki, Marinette must stop Sandboy, a supervillain bringing the citizens' nightmares to life.

20.title: Frozer

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: A figure skater named Philippe is akumatized into Frozer and is determined to turn Paris into an ice kingdom.

21.title: Style Queen

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: After being humiliated by Gabriel Agreste, Chloé's mother, Audrey Bourgeois, is akumatized into Style Queen. Armed with a magic scepter and determined to get revenge, she attacks Adrien. How will Ladybug defeat Style Queen without Cat Noir to help her?

22.title: Queen Wasp

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: After failing to impress her mother by turning into Queen Bee, Chloé is akumatized into Queen Wasp.

23.title: Malediktator

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

23.plot: When Chloé threatens to leave Paris, Mr. Bourgeois is akumatized into Malediktator, a supervillain armed with absolute power and determined to make his daughter stay with him.

24.title: Heroes Day, Part 1: Catalyst

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

24.plot: Marinette lies about preparing a good deed to perform for others on the Day of Heroes and quickly finds her untruth spinning out of control.

25.title: Heroes Day, Part 2: Mayura

episode of.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir (TV Series 2015– )

25.plot: Ladybug and Cat Noir face one of their most fearsome opponents when Hawk Moth sets a sinister plan into motion by akumatizing his assistant.

imdb.plot outline: Marinette Dupain-Cheng, a shy high-school student, has inherited some magical ladybug-shaped earrings. The ornaments grant the power of Luck to whoever wears them. Yet there is one condition : they have to be worn in an altruistic manner, or else, beware of the consequences . Whenever the situation needs it, Marinette turns into LADYBUG, the guardian angel.
imdb.title: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug & Cat Noir

plot: Marinette and Adrien, two normal teens, transform into superheroes Ladybug and Cat Noir when an evil threatens their city.::Fizz_Y123

Marinette Dupain-Cheng, a shy high-school student, has inherited some magical ladybug-shaped earrings. The ornaments grant the power of Luck to whoever wears them. Yet there is one condition : they have to be worn in an altruistic manner, or else, beware of the consequences . Whenever the situation needs it, Marinette turns into LADYBUG, the guardian angel.::Anonymous

By daylight, Marinette Dupain-Cheng and Adrien Agreste are ordinary teenagers, but unbeknownst to their family and friends, the two of them carry a huge secret...using the powers of magical creatures called Kwami, they transform into the superheroes Ladybug and Cat Noir. With a mission to protect the city of Paris from the evil Hawk Moth, the two of them must learn to cope with their new responsibilities, as well as ordinary troubles involving love, school, family, and friends. Most of all, they must learn to put their romantic feelings aside in order to perform their duty, unaware of each other's true identities.::Carly Moon

Marinette Dupain-Cheng, your average shy, clumsy high-school student is given magical powers, along with her crush, Adrien Agreste. While facing homework, school, bullies and keeping her identity secret, she turns into Ladybug, with her partner Chat Noir. Saving Paris from Hawkmoth and other villains isn't something every pair of tenth graders can handle.

The series is set in Paris, France, and stars two teenage superheroes. Marinette Dupain-Cheng is the daughter of French father and a Chinese mother, a schoolgirl, and an aspiring fashion designer. She is chosen to become the latest keeper of a Miraculous (a magical artifact), which transforms her into Ladybug and enhances her combat skills. Adrien Agreste works as a professional model while in his teens and has many female admirers. But he is secretly lonely, as his father (a famous fashion designer) intentionally keeps him isolated from the world, his mother has mysteriously disappeared, and he was home-schooled for most of his life. He is chosen to become the next wielder of a Miraculous, which transforms him into Chat Noir (French for "Black Cat") and enhances his combat skills. The two of them have to protect Paris from akumas (Japanese for "devil" or "demon") . Through the series, ordinary people who are feeling intense fear, sadness, anger, or jealousy are possessed by the akumas and transformed into super-villains with varying powers. Ladybug and Chat Noir have to both defeat the villain and free the hosts from possession. The stakes are high when the possessed hosts include the heroes' friends, classmates, and even their own relatives.::dimadick
